Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
modify_item_by_index
int modify_item_by_index(int index,
mixed long)
This method non-destructively modifies the items values. It will not remove the value for this item, remember this! If you add again and again you will end up with multiple of the same object.

Parameters:
str - the name to reference the object by
long - the long bits to change on the item
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
See also:
/std/room->modify_item_by_name()

query_gather
mixed * query_gather()
This method figures out what gatherables are available for the current description set. The array contains the values passed into the add_item stuff with the "gather" index.

Returns:
the current gatherables
query_lng
string * query_lng()
This method returns all the long descriptions for the item object. The positions in the array correspond to the index used to reference the items.

Returns:
the array of long descriptions
query_plurals
mapping query_plurals()
This method returns the plurals mapping used in the item object.

Returns:
the plurals in the item object
query_short_array
string * query_short_array()
This method returns the base array of shorts to be processed in the other short methods. This is the short without the leading 'the', 'a' whatever...

Returns:
the array of shorts
query_shrt
string * query_shrt()
This method returns all the short descriptions for the item object. The positions in the array correspond to the index used to reference the items.

Returns:
the array of long descriptions
query_verbs

remove_item_by_index
int remove_item_by_index(int index)
This method removes an item by the returned index number from the add_item method.

Parameters:
index - the index number to remove
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
Example: 
int _item_number;

void bing {
   _item_numer = add_item("frog", "It wombles!");
} /* bing() */

void remove_bing() {
   remove_item(_item_number);
} /* remove_bing() */
remove_item_by_name
int remove_item_by_name(string str)
This method removes an item by the short description.

Parameters:
index - the index number to remove
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
setup_item
int setup_item(mixed nam,
mixed long,
int no_plural)
This method setups the item initially. This is called by the add_item method in the room itself.

Parameters:
nam - the name(s) to add the item for
long - the long description of the item
no_plural - do not add a plural flag
Returns:
the index associated with the item
